body.name: Water Bottle 40 oz. Flask Double Wall Stainless Steel & Vacuum Insulated (Black) Sport Hydro Container (Standard Mouth/Leak Proof/BPA Free Cap), (MB000315)
body.stockDetail: Only 3 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 26 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Perfect For Both Summer or Winter - It’s the perfect choice for either the hot summer months or cold winter climates. Ensure hot beverages stay hot for up to 6 hrs. during the winter months or even keep drinks cold for up to 24 hrs. throughout the hot summer days.

Dual Insulated Walls - Dual insulated, doubled layered walls ensure drinks stay at a constant temperature as to the same temperature of the original beverage. Two powerful walls facilitate keeping the perfect temperature while a vacuum seal helps prevent liquid seeping the outer wall.

2 Special Lids - 2 special and unique lids that both optimize drinking beverages and eliminate spills and splashes. Keep beverages within an airtight seal to prevent any accidental leaks due to minor drops and falls. Worry less about spills and more about enjoying your beverage.

Fully Hydrated 40 OZ. - Stay fully hydrated all-day-long with 40 oz. of liquid. Take it to the park, gym, office, or hike and ensure there is plenty of your liquid remaining. A sleek, jet black color scheme with a unique anti-sweat design provides less slipping when holding the tumbler.

Eco-Friendly Design - Completely eliminate the poor decision of continually buying plastic bottles or materials for drinking. These plastics continue to damage and destroy our environment so by choosing Dione, our tumbler is BPA-Free and dishwasher available to wash, clean, and reuse again and again.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: FEATURES 2 UNIQUE LIDS Maximize containment levels for various liquids with 2 unique lids. BPA FREE BPA Free and fully dishwasher safe to wash, clean, and reuse daily. DUAL WALLED DESIGN Dual-walled insulated design keeps drinks at a constant temperature.

CURVED ROUNDED EDGE Built-in curved rounded edge for easier grip and lightweight design. LONG-LASTING COLOR Sleek and stylish jet black color stays vibrant even after dishwasher use. STAINLESS STEEL 18/8 pro-grade stainless steel for crisp and pristine taste for every drink.

Dione has created a 40 oz. tumbler bottle that was designed for hot summer months and long cold winters. Keep drinks hot for up to 6 hrs. and keep them cold for 24 hrs. Included are 2 special lids with an anti-leak seal to prevent spills from minor drops. Plus, an sustainable metal design helps encourage the continuous and positive support of our environment using BPA-Free materials. Remain Hot Or Cold: Ensure your drink remains hot or cold during the majority of your day in either the summer or winter. 40 Full Oz : Full 40 oz. of liquid containment to stay hydrated all day long during daily activities. Sustainability: A sustainable metal water bottle using BPA-Free materials to rewash, clean, and reuse the very next day; for a better planet. Sizing & Dimensions Flip Sport Lid: 1.75” (height) x 1.3” (height) x 2.6” (diameter)On-The-Go Lid: 1” (height) x 3” (diameter)Dione Water Bottle: 10.25” (height) x 3.5” (diameter) Material Specification All Dione bottles are made with 18/8 interior & 18/10 exterior professional food-grade stainless steel (304 grade) and BPA-free PP plastic – both recognized for their durable, non-toxic and safe to use of the whole family. Optimal Use We recommend properly cleaning the Dione water bottle at least once a week. By cleaning regularly, you can ensure the longevity of the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Gives the option of two covers on my needs, and last longer with less refills throughout the day

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fue un regala para mi nieto
reviews.reviewText: Le gusta mucho ,dice que es su preferido

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Functional but paint is cheap
reviews.reviewText: The actual bottle itself is great! It very easy to clean and keeps my water room temperature, even if sitting in the car. I dropped a star because the coloring is cheap. The white swirly design smudged and got ugly after a week of use. I figured it was just cheap white paint so I tried to remove it with nail polish remover. But then the black also came up as well! Beware that this is a silver bottle painted different colors. It’s not a colored plastic outer coating. But it’s cheaper than a hydro so you get what you pay for. I ordered some cute stickers to put on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does What It Says!
reviews.reviewText: This thing is a life saver I use it at work and it helps fill it up at 5:30 a.m. and even after I drink up my Gatorade or whatever I have in it,the ice is still there the next day. Love It!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Only insulates for 4-5 hours, cap broke after 3rd use
reviews.reviewText: My family has mostly purchased Hydroflask insulated water bottles. I saw this on Amazon for less than half the price with good reviews and I caved in and bought it. The water bottle looks nice on the outside. However, on my first use, I noticed that all the ice had melted after about 4 hours, and the water started to get warm after about 6-7 hours. I have it another couple of tries, and the results were always the same. This “insulated bottle” has nowhere near the same quality of insulation as our hydroflask water bottles. The two caps are a nice touch. However, one cap does not screw on completely, and it will sometimes fall off. The strap on that cap broke off the 3rd time I used it. Bottom line, I don’t think this bottle is built well, and I would have returned it except that I didn’t start the return during the 30 day window. Darn. Guess I have a large water bottle that doesn’t insulate very well…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sport flip top is useless.
reviews.reviewText: Love the water bottle and the lid with rubber carrying strap! The bottle is nice looking and hasn’t dented when I’ve banged it on stuff. Having to remove that top many times to drink from it, ice melts much quicker than the times given. Sport flip to is useless. Carrying handle is way too small and you can’t drink from it because your nose gets in the way. I have a small nose and it still doesn’t work. That is the only bad thing otherwise great water bottle!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excelente botella de agua
reviews.reviewText: Pedimos la botella para probarla, aunque dijimos que 40 oz es mucho, al recibirla y ver la calidad de los materiales no dudamos en entregarla a nuestro hijo para que la usara en el colegio y para ir al gimnasio, el resultado es fenomenal, la botella conserva la temperatura por muchas horas y es muy resistente, la recomiendo ampliamente.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2023
